/* [Award_SqlMap.xml] lightpack.award.dao.award.listByAwardRootId */ WITH CTE AS ( SELECT CONVERT(NVARCHAR, '/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, SORT_ORDER+1000)) PATH_ORDER, 1 INDENTATION, A1.* FROM IKEP4_AW_AWARD A1 inner join IKEP4_VW_PERMIT_SYS_RESOURCE B on A1.BOARD_ID = B.RESOURCE_NAME WHERE BOARD_ROOT_ID = #awardRootId# AND PORTAL_Id = #portalId# AND BOARD_DELETE = 0 AND BOARD_PARENT_ID is null AND B.OPERATION_NAME IN ('READ') AND B.CLASS_NAME='Award-Award' AND B.USER_ID IN (#userId#, 'OPEN') UNION ALL SELECT CONVERT(NVARCHAR, CTE.PATH_ORDER + '/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, A2.SORT_ORDER+1000)) PATH_ORDER, INDENTATION + 1, A2.* FROM IKEP4_AW_AWARD A2 ,CTE ,IKEP4_VW_PERMIT_SYS_RESOURCE B WHERE A2.BOARD_ROOT_ID = #awardRootId# AND A2.BOARD_DELETE = 0 AND A2.BOARD_ID = B.RESOURCE_NAME AND B.OPERATION_NAME IN ('READ') AND B.CLASS_NAME='Award-Award' AND B.USER_ID IN (#userId#, 'OPEN') AND CTE.BOARD_ID = A2.BOARD_PARENT_ID ) SELECT INDENTATION, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IKEP4_AW_AWARD B WHERE CTE.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_PARENT_ID AND B.BOARD_DELETE = 0) AS HAS_CHILDREN,

FROM CTE ORDER BY PATH_ORDER

/* [Award_SqlMap.xml] lightpack.award.dao.award.listByAwardRootId */ WITH CTE AS ( SELECT CONVERT(NVARCHAR, '/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, SORT_ORDER+1000)) PATH_ORDER, 1 INDENTATION, A1.* FROM IKEP4_AW_AWARD A1 inner join IKEP4_VW_PERMIT_SYS_RESOURCE B on A1.BOARD_ID = B.RESOURCE_NAME WHERE BOARD_ROOT_ID = #awardRootId# AND PORTAL_Id = #portalId# AND BOARD_DELETE = 0 AND BOARD_PARENT_ID is null AND B.OPERATION_NAME IN ('READ') AND B.CLASS_NAME='Award-Award' AND B.USER_ID IN (#userId#, 'OPEN') UNION ALL SELECT CONVERT(NVARCHAR, CTE.PATH_ORDER + '/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, A2.SORT_ORDER+1000)) PATH_ORDER, INDENTATION + 1, A2.* FROM IKEP4_AW_AWARD A2 ,CTE ,IKEP4_VW_PERMIT_SYS_RESOURCE B WHERE A2.BOARD_ROOT_ID = #awardRootId# AND A2.BOARD_DELETE = 0 AND A2.BOARD_ID = B.RESOURCE_NAME AND B.OPERATION_NAME IN ('READ') AND B.CLASS_NAME='Award-Award' AND B.USER_ID IN (#userId#, 'OPEN') AND CTE.BOARD_ID = A2.BOARD_PARENT_ID ) SELECT INDENTATION, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IKEP4_AW_AWARD B WHERE CTE.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_PARENT_ID AND B.BOARD_DELETE = 0) AS HAS_CHILDREN,

/* [Award_SqlMap.xml] lightpack.award.dao.award.listByAwardRootId */ WITH CTE AS ( SELECT CONVERT(NVARCHAR, '/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, SORT_ORDER+1000)) PATH_ORDER, 1 INDENTATION, A1.* FROM IKEP4_AW_AWARD A1 inner join IKEP4_VW_PERMIT_SYS_RESOURCE B on A1.BOARD_ID = B.RESOURCE_NAME WHERE BOARD_ROOT_ID = #awardRootId# AND PORTAL_Id = #portalId# AND BOARD_DELETE = 0 AND BOARD_PARENT_ID is null AND B.OPERATION_NAME IN ('READ') AND B.CLASS_NAME='Award-Award' AND B.USER_ID IN (#userId#, 'OPEN') UNION ALL SELECT CONVERT(NVARCHAR, CTE.PATH_ORDER + '/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, A2.SORT_ORDER+1000)) PATH_ORDER, INDENTATION + 1, A2.* FROM IKEP4_AW_AWARD A2 ,CTE ,IKEP4_VW_PERMIT_SYS_RESOURCE B WHERE A2.BOARD_ROOT_ID = #awardRootId# AND A2.BOARD_DELETE = 0 AND A2.BOARD_ID = B.RESOURCE_NAME AND B.OPERATION_NAME IN ('READ') AND B.CLASS_NAME='Award-Award' AND B.USER_ID IN (#userId#, 'OPEN') AND CTE.BOARD_ID = A2.BOARD_PARENT_ID ) SELECT INDENTATION, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IKEP4_AW_AWARD B WHERE CTE.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_PARENT_ID AND B.BOARD_DELETE = 0) AS HAS_CHILDREN, BOARD_ID, BOARD_PARENT_ID, SORT_ORDER, BOARD_NAME, BOARD_ROOT_ID, BOARD_DESCRIPTION, BOARD_TYPE, URL, LIST_TYPE, ANONYMOUS, RSS, FILE_SIZE, IMAGE_FILE_SIZE, IMAGE_WIDTH, PAGE_NUM, DOC_POPUP, REPLY, LINEREPLY, RESTRICTION_TYPE, READ_PERMISSION, WRITE_PERMISSION, ADMIN_PERMISSION, BOARD_POPUP, FILE_ATTACH_OPTION, ALLOW_TYPE, PORTAL_ID, PORTLET, BOARD_DELETE, REGISTER_ID, REGISTER_NAME, REGIST_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATER_NAME, CTE. UPDATE_DATE, BOARD_ENGLISH_NAME, BOARD_ENGLISH_DESCRIPTION, MOVE, WORD_HEAD, CONTENTS_READ_PERMISSION, CONTENTS_READ_MAIL, MOBILE_USE, MOBILE_WRITE_USE, COLOR_USE FROM CTE INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM IKEP4_CO_MENULIST_MOBILE WHERE USER_ID=#userId# and type='BOARD') Aa ON CTE.award_id = Aa.ITEM_ID
